This app had developed to show simple usage of Flick API by @gturedii.

Source:
https://github.com/gokhan-turedi/flickr-api-sample

string-array.name: quote
string-array.item: I need you like a heart needs a beat.
It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
The spaces between your fingers are meant to be filled with mine.
Loving you is one of the best decision in my life.
Walk with me through life…and I’ll have everything I’ll need for the journey.
I may not be your first date, kiss or love…but I want to be your last everything.
Come live in my heart and pay no rent.
Every time I see you, I fall in love all over again.
The first time you touched me, I knew I was born to be yours.
There are only two times that I want to be with you. Now and Forever.
Without his love I can do nothing, with his love, there is nothing I cannot do.
Without his love I can do nothing, with his love, there is nothing I cannot do.
The best feeling is when you look at him…and he is already staring.
To the world, you may be one person, but to me, you are the world.
I LOVE U to the MOOD and back
